SIGNIFICANT: solved all OSError and premature termination of Queue task issues by proper use of Queue. All tasks now complete and produce required pdb refinements. Need to solve gracefull exit, the program can only be quit with CTRL_C

Author:    Hari Jayaram <harijay@gmail.com>
Committer: hari <hari@hjubuntu.(none)>
